channel.title: Radiology on Jonathan Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Radiology on Jonathan Huang

item.title: Efficiency and Quality of Generative AIâ€“Assisted Radiograph Reporting
item.description: We investigate how clinical implementation of a generative AI model for all-radiograph report generation improves reporting efficiency.

item.title: Prediction and Detection of Glaucomatous Visual Field Progression Using Deep Learning on Macular Optical Coherence Tomography
item.description: We investigate how unsupervised learning methods applied to macular optical coherence tomography may detect and predict glaucoma progression.

item.title: Generative Artificial Intelligence for Chest Radiograph Interpretation in the Emergency Department
item.description: We describe a clinical evaluation of a generative AI model for chest radiograph report generation in the emergency department setting.
